name: Cowruption
description:
A small game made for a2b2 jam! Don't listen to the cow

Controls:
Arrow keys or wasd : movement
Enter : accept corruption
or controller : left stick or dpad, A to jump, Y to accept corruption

Credits :

Matos: dev
David: music and level design
Nico: music and sound effects
R3D: background art and props
Emilie: main characters and the habbo door
Gaek: background art and items
Lu-K: Barkmout and background art, first speedrunner
